long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Did you ever want to know how many followers the people who follow you have? So you can quickly see who you should follow back and engage with? This ğ• Twitter extension does exactly that. It shows the amount of followers your followers have on the "followers" tab (Wow, how many times can you say followers in one sentence?)
